mapper.select: SELECT com_id, com_name, SUBSTR(com_reg_date, 1, 10) as com_reg_date, SUBSTR(com_mod_date,1,10) as com_mod_date, com_contract_name, com_manager_phone, com_manager_email, com_contract_stat, com_contract_type, com_homePage, com_address, com_contract_agree, com_tel FROM ktds17b.company ORDER BY com_reg_date desc

select * ktds17b.from company
WHERE com_name LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
WHERE com_id LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'

SELECT com_contract_stat, com_name, com_contract_name, com_manager_phone, com_id, com_contract_type, SUBSTR(com_reg_date, 1, 10) as com_reg_date, com_address FROM (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY com_reg_date desc) NUM, com_id, com_name, SUBSTR(com_reg_date, 1, 10) as com_reg_date, com_contract_type, com_contract_name, com_manager_phone, com_contract_stat, com_address FROM ktds17b.company ORDER BY com_reg_date desc) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{pageStart}
AND #{perPageNum} - 1
AND (#{perPageNum} + #{pageStart}) - 1
order by com_reg_date desc

SELECT com_id, com_name, SUBSTR(com_reg_date, 1, 10) as com_reg_date, SUBSTR(com_mod_date,1,10) as com_mod_date, com_contract_name, com_manager_phone, com_manager_email, com_contract_stat, com_contract_type, com_homePage, com_address, com_contract_agree, com_tel FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY com_reg_date desc) NUM, com_id, com_name, SUBSTR(com_reg_date, 1, 10) as com_reg_date, SUBSTR(com_mod_date,1,10) as com_mod_date, com_contract_name, com_manager_phone, com_manager_email, com_contract_stat, com_contract_type, com_homePage, com_address, com_contract_agree, com_tel from ktds17b.company
WHERE com_name LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
WHERE com_id LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
ORDER BY com_reg_date desc) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{pageStart}
